name: Skrivel.se
description:
Skrivel.se is a bit of a play on words lost in translation. Hosted by two nerds from sweden but most posts are in english on here. We're a small instance with an active federated timeline. We'd love to have you on, but you should expect us to say hi, and to ask who you are ðŸ˜‰

The server is very active, but small.
